text.p: These are the leading stories in the Skopje press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Thousands of believers celebrated Easter in churches all over Macedonia and in America, Canada and Australia.

- Association of depositors of the bankrupt TAT financial institution rejected at a meeting in Bitola the law on compensations proposed by government. Several thousand demonstrators on Saturday demanded from the government to reconsider the proposed law and threatened with massive demonstrations in Skopje.
